sn11.19:1.2: “Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo matalim sangahakam amantesi:
sn11.19:1.3: ‘yojehi, samma matali, sahassayuttam ajannaratham, uyyanabhumim gacchama subhumim dassanaya’ti.
sn11.19:1.4: ‘Evam, bhaddantava’ti kho, bhikkhave, matali sangahako sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva sahassayuttam ajannaratham yojetva sakkassa devanamindassa pativedesi:
sn11.19:1.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo vejayantapasada orohanto anjalim katva sudam bhagavantam namassati.
sn11.19:1.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, matali sangahako sakkam devanamindam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
